tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_collection_hotspots (
  hotspot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location GEOMETRY,
  waste_type VARCHAR,
  collection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE WasteCollectionHotspots (
    hotspot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location GEOGRAPHY,
    collection_date TIMESTAMP,
    collected_by VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Interventions (
    intervention_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hotspot_id INT REFERENCES WasteCollectionHotspots(hotspot_id),
    intervention_date TIMESTAMP,
    intervention_type VARCHAR(50),
    intervention_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE InterventionsHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    intervention_id INT REFERENCES Interventions(intervention_id),
    completion_date TIMESTAMP,
    completion_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE HotspotsAnalysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hotspot_id INT REFERENCES WasteCollectionHotspots(hotspot_id),
    analysis_date TIMESTAMP,
    analysis_results TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE WasteCollectionHotspots (
  hotspot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location GEOMETRY,
  waste_type VARCHAR(100),
  collection_schedule TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE CollectionInterventions (
  intervention_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hotspot_id INT,
  intervention_date DATE,
  intervention_type VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE CollectionStats (
  stats_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hotspot_id INT,
  collection_date DATE,
  collection_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE CollectionConstraints (
  constraint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hotspot_id INT,
  constraint_type VARCHAR(100),
  constraint_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE InterventionLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  intervention_id INT,
  log_date TIMESTAMP,
  log_message TEXT
)
